description.desc:
Hex a target area, dealing Damage and transforming all enemies into a Rabbit for a limited duration.

Rabbits are small and move faster, but take increased Damage and are unable to perform most actions.
Hex does not interrupt abilities.

info_sections.loc_string:
Hex a target area, dealing Damage and transforming all enemies into a Rabbit for a limited duration.

Rabbits are small and move faster, but take increased Damage and are unable to perform most actions.
Hex does not interrupt abilities.

description.desc:
Summon an Assistant at the targeted location. The Assistant attacks whenever you fire your weapon, dealing Damage.

While the Assistant is out, you can press [Ability 2] to swap positions with your Assistant.

Casting Spectral Assistant also reloads your weapon.
description.quip: Summon your faithful assistant
description.t2_desc: +5s Duration & 5m Range
description.t3_desc: +45% Fire Rate and +15 Assistant Damage

description.desc: Throw a grenade that explodes in a cloud of freezing ice, damaging and slowing enemies.
description.quip: Damage and slow enemies
description.t2_desc: Frost Grenade now heals 100 HP to friendly targets. Scales with Spirit.

description.desc:
Your next Heavy Melee attack against an enemy deals increased damage and either reload your weapon instantly or give you up to +100% bonus ammo.
Only activates when Bonus Ammo is not full.
Throw a grenade that begins pulsing when it lands. Each pulse applies damage, movement slow, and stacking damage amplification for Paradox against the victim.
description.quip: Throw a grenade that pulses, dealing damage and slow
description.t3_desc: +45 Pulse Damage and +0.75m Radius per pulse.

description.desc:
Imbue an ability with bonus Spirit Damage on the first hit. When the ability is used, your weapon is reloaded and has a Fire Rate bonus for that clip.
Only activates when Ammo is not full.
Grabs any enemy looked at by Wrecker, putting them in stasis and holding them overhead. Stuns, and damages all captured enemies when finished. Any grabbed NPCs are salvaged.
description.t3_desc: Wrecker is Invulnerable during use

description.desc: When you receive a Boon, automatically heal.

Copy the Ultimate of an enemy hero for a limited time. Reactivating the ability will use the Copied Ultimate instead.

Copies will inherit this ability's upgrade points.
Copies will not gain benefits from Imbue.
Audience Participation will also copy the cooldown.
description.quip: Copy an enemies Ultimate for a limited time
description.t1_desc: Upgrade the Copy.
description.t2_desc: Upgrade the Copy AGAIN!
description.t3_desc: Upgrade the Copy ONCE AGAIN!

description.desc: Latches onto an Enemy, damaging them and healing yourself while attached. Targets must be in line of sight and within max range to stay latched. A successful kill also restores a Bio Blast charge.
description.quip: Consume an enemy trooper or neutral
description.t3_desc: +2 additional targets

description.desc:
Create a tether that drains enemy health over time and heals you. Target must be in line of sight and within max range to drain. You can shoot and use other abilities during the drain, but your move speed is reduced by half.
[Alt-Cast] to give health to friendly Heroes.
Press [Ability 2] to cancel.
description.quip: Steal health from an enemy over time
description.t3_desc: Ability becomes charged and grants +1 Charge

description.desc: Create a singularity in your hands that pulls in nearby enemies and damages them.
description.quip: Pull in and stun the enemy team
description.t3_desc: Singularity takes 4% of the enemies' max health each second.

description.passive: Increases the number of Air Jump, Air Dashes and Wall Jumps that can be performed before landing from 1 to 2
While you are below 50% health, you gain stat bonuses.

description.desc: Spray scalding water in a cone ahead of you. You build up bonus weapon damage as the spray damages an enemy hero.
description.quip: Spray scalding water in a cone ahead of you.

description.desc: Each hero kill grants permanent Weapon Damage (up to a max of 7 times). Death results in the loss of 1 stack.
Reduces the Cooldown of your abilities and items.
While reloading, pressing [R] during the highlighted portion will instantly finish your reload and grant you Fire Rate and Bullet Lifesteal.
Your bullets apply Movement Slow.
Your next bullet deals bonus Spirit Damage.
Periodically deals Spirit Damage to the closest two enemies nearby.

Focus on enemies to connect whips to them. After channeling, connected enemies are lifted and stunned then slammed into the ground. Your victims and any enemies in the landing zone will be damaged and slowed.
Press [LMC] to throw connected enemies early. Enemies that are not in line of sight or go out of range during the latch time will not be grabbed.
description.quip: Lift enemies and smash them into the ground
description.t3_desc: Stun enemies in the landing zone for 1.0s

description.desc: When you perform a Light or Heavy Melee attack against a hero, deal extra Spirit Damage with the attack and reduce the target's Spirit Resist.
Spew napalm that slows enemy movement and amplifies the damage Infernus does to them.
description.quip: Spew napalm that amplifies your damage
description.t2_desc: Infernus gains 12% Lifesteal against victims
description.t3_desc: +20% Damage Amplification and -33% Heal/Regen

description.desc:
While channelling, restore health over time to you and any allies nearby.
You can dash and melee without breaking the channel.
description.quip: Heal yourself and those around you
description.t1_desc: Gain +4m/s movespeed bonus for 8s if Aurora is fully channeled. Gain instantly with 5AP Upgrade.
description.t3_desc: Full move and ability use and additionaly heals +3.4% of Max Health per second

description.desc:
Leap high into the air and choose a ground location to crash into. When you hit the ground, all enemies in the radius are damaged and stunned.
Press [LMC] to crash down early.
description.quip: Smash into enemies from above, stunning them
description.t2_desc: Gain 100 Max HP and 15% Fire Rate per hero hit. Lasts 25s.
description.t3_desc: On cast, become Immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm. Expires 3s after landing.

description.desc:
Throw out a trap that begins to arm itself. Once armed, the trap will trigger when an enemy enters its radius, applying Curse and Movement Slow that interrupts, Silences, Disarms, and prevents item usage.
Hit the trap with a Charged Shot to detonate early with increased radius.
description.quip: Place a trap that restricts enemy movement
description.t3_desc: Grey Talon deals +30% more Bullet Damage to enemies hit by Spirit Snare for 10s

description.desc: Strike enemies with your whip, stealing life from them.
description.quip: Lifesteal from targets ahead of you
description.t1_desc: Apply 35% Movement Slow for 3s
description.t3_desc: +105 Damage and applies 35% Fire Rate Slow

description.desc: Throw a stake that tethers enemies to the location where the stake lands. Enemy movement is restricted to the length of the tether.
description.quip: Tether your enemies to the ground
description.t3_desc: +0.5s Tether Duration and +2m Capture Radius

description.desc: Power up your weapon with a shock effect, making your bullets proc shock damage on your target. This shock damage bounces to enemies near your target. Occurs once per burst shot.
description.quip: Create electric arcs with your shots
description.t1_desc: Shock Damage applies -15% Spirit Resist for 8s
description.t3_desc: +12 Shock Damage, improved Spirit scaling, and +3 Max Jumps

description.desc: Charge up a powerful shot that pierces through enemies. Hold [1] or [LMC] to hold the shot.
description.quip: Charge up a long range shot
description.t2_desc: +65 Damage
description.t3_desc: Improved damage scaling and -3s Charge Delay

description.desc:
Launch yourself high into the air. While in the air, you can use the active again to drop down faster.
Cannot be used for 5s if attacked by enemy Hero.
Fire a projectile which silences and damages the first enemy hero it hits. Silence does not interrupt channeling abilities.

description.active: Reset the cooldown of your most recently used non-ultimate ability.

description.desc: Throw a dagger, dealing Spirit Damage and applying a Fading Slow.
description.quip: Throw a slowing dagger
description.t3_desc: +1ss Slow Duration and remove 1 Stamina

description.desc: Reset the cooldown of all your abilities and restore all your charges.

Sacrifice some of your health to launch a bomb that deals damage after a brief arm time.
Self damage type is Spirit and can be mitigated.
description.quip: Sacrifice some health to launch a damaging bomb
description.t3_desc: Bombs leave a toxic mess on the ground, dealing 26% of the original damage per second, for 6s.

description.desc: Regenerate a portion of incoming damage over time.
description.quip: Regenerate some of the damage you receive

description.desc: Enter a flurry, firing your weapon at nearby enemies with perfect accuracy and added Spirit Damage.
description.quip: Unleash a flurry of bullets around you
description.t3_desc:
+40% Bullet Evasion and
+4mm/s Dance Movespeed

description.desc: Increases the range and effect radius of your abilities and items.
Deploy a Statue to track enemies in an area. The Ward will also attack enemies recently damaged by Calico. Targeted enemies have reduced healing and heal Calico when damaged.
description.quip: Deploy a statue that survey's an area
description.t1_desc: Statues gain Invisibility when not attacking.
description.t2_desc: +30s Duration and +20 DPS.
description.t3_desc: 0% Damage Reduction and -30% Heal Reduction on targets.

description.desc: Use your scoped rifle to fire a powerful shot over long distances. Deal only partial damage until fully charged after 1.0s of being scoped. Does bonus damage to enemies with less than 50% health remaining. Landing a killing blow on a player with Assassinate grants you bonus souls.
description.quip: Snipe injured targets for massive damage

description.desc: Your bullets have a chance to shock your target. The shock will jump to a nearby enemy.
Reduces the effect of enemy applied healing reduction.
Walking through a cosmic veil grants you Stealth, increased Move Speed and restores all Bullet and Spirit Shields.
Imbue an ability to apply slow on a hit target and deal an additional percentage of the damage dealt to enemies around the target after a short delay.

Blink to the target location. On arrival, briefly gain movement speed and become Invisible.

[Cast] Appear at the target location.
[Alt-Cast] Appear in place.
Enemies will not know which cast you performed.

Channel to start launching projectiles that deal damage and apply movement slow around their impact point. Each projectile landed on a hero grants you a stacking buff that amplifies all of your damage.
If you cast it while in the air, you'll float and maintain any horizontal momentum you started with.
description.quip: Air glide while firing multiple projectiles
description.t3_desc: +4% Amp Per Stack and 2m Radius

description.desc:
Hex a target, transforming them into a Rabbit for a limited duration.

Rabbits are small and move faster, but take increased Damage and are unable to perform most actions.
Hex does not interrupt abilities.
description.quip: Transform your enemy into a rabbit
description.t3_desc: Hex all enemies within 6m

description.desc:
Turn to shadows and possess Ava. You gain Movement Speed and become Hidden on the Minimap, but cannot attack or cast abilities.

Cannot be used for 5s after taking damage from an enemy hero.
description.quip: Take control of Ava
description.t3_desc: -15s Cooldown. Gain 30 Health Regen during Ava.

description.desc: Materialize a fist in the world that punches units in the area and send them flying. Enemies will be dealt damage, have their dash distance reduced for a brief moment, and have their movement slowed. This is considered a Light Melee attack.
description.quip: Punch enemies with a giant fist
description.t2_desc: +35 Damage and +15% Movement Slow
description.t3_desc: -11.5s Cooldown and now deals Heavy Melee Damage

description.desc: Reduces the duration of all negative effects applied to you.

description.active: Grants Lifesteal, Fire Rate, and Ammo. This added Ammo is not limited by your max magazine size.

description.desc: Shoot a ball of lightning that travels in a straight line. Does damage to all targets in its radius. Slows down when damaging enemies and stops if it hits the world.
description.quip: Launch a damaging ball of lightning
description.t3_desc: +70 DPS and +1m radius

description.desc:
Apply a charge to a target enemy hero. After a short duration, the static charge stuns and damages enemies within the radius.
Alt-Cast to cast on yourself.
description.quip: Apply a delayed area stun to an enemy hero

description.desc: Shooting a target increases your bullet damage on that target. Gain one stack per bullet hit, two if the hit is a headshot.
description.quip: Deal increasing bullet damage to a target
description.t1_desc: 60 Spirit damage and 15% slow for 2s to target every 20 stacks
description.t2_desc: +40 Max Stacks and +5s Duration

description.desc: Activate your relic. Enemy heroes nearby have slowed movement and dashes, and receive damage over time when looking towards you. If enemies look at you long enough, they get cursed.
When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Move Speed and Fire Rate reduced.
Your bullets build up a Debuff that briefly Silences and reduces their Spirit Damage. Victims are immune to the build up for 12s after debuff expires.

Start charging your weapon and gain increased move speed once it's fully charged. Your next shot will release the energy, dealing spirit damage and applying a time stop to the enemy hit. The damage dealt is an amplification of your current weapon damage.

You can slow time on yourself by pressing [RMC] while an empowered shot is available.
description.quip: Charge up your weapon to deal high damage and timestop
description.t2_desc: -10.0s Cooldown and +2s Speed Boost Duration
description.t3_desc: +50% Max Damage Amp

description.desc: Turns you into a living bomb that explodes after a short delay, stunning all enemies in its radius.
description.quip: Stun all nearby enemies after a short delay
description.t2_desc: +0.5s Stun Duration and +3m Radius
description.t3_desc: +115 Damage and 85% lifesteal from enemy heroes hit

description.desc: Your bullets apply a debuff that amplifies your Spirit Damage against the target and grants you Spirit Lifesteal against them.

Your next Dash-Jump does not cost an extra stamina and the next ability you use will have bonus Range, Duration, and Spirit Power. Additionally, you gain Fire Rate and bonus Ammo until your next reload. Lasts up to 7s.
Increases the range and effect radius of your abilities and items.
Block the next Spirit Damage or Debuff, preventing its effects. Only regenerates outside of combat.
Load your weapon with demonic rounds. After a delay, you empower your next shots to deal bonus damage and penetrate enemies.

Throw an explosive barrel that arms after a delay.

Once armed, the barrel can be shot, meleed, launched, or detonated by another barrel to explode, dealing Damage.
description.quip: Throw a barrel that explodes when shot

description.desc: While you have a Bullet Shield, gain Weapon Damage and Fire Rate.

Take flight with an ally or a bomb. Drop your ally or bomb to cause a large explosion that causes movement slow. Ivy and ally gain a bullet shield when flying ends.
While lifted, your ally gains bullet resist but cannot attack and deals -50% damage. Air Drop has faster cast time when targeting an ally.
Hold [Fly Down] at cast to reduce launch height
[LMC] to accelerate flying speed.
[RMC] to drop ally/bomb.
description.quip: Death from Above!  Fly and drop a bomb (or ally) on enemies
description.t1_desc: 0% Bullet Resist on enemies hit for 0s
description.t2_desc: +300 Bullet Shield and +14mm Explode Radius
description.t3_desc: Applies Silence on enemies hit for +0s

description.desc:
Any time you secure or deny a Soul from an entity you get ammo back and gain stacking Spirit Power.
At Max Stacks, gain bonus Sprint speed
Your Melee Attack applies Movement Slow and heals you for 55% of the Melee Damage dealt plus 110. This heal is 40% effective vs non-heroes.

Target is knocked down and Stunned after a 2s delay, interrupting and temporarily preventing them from taking any action. Stun lasts up to 2x longer against airborne targets based on how high off the ground they are (up to 30mm).

Dealing Spirit Damage builds an increasing Slow. Once full, the buildup is consumed to apply an Immobilize and a burst of Spirit Damage.

This effect has a cooldown per target.
Imbue an ability with permanent Spirit Power. When that ability is used, gain bonus Move Speed and maintain full speed while attacking.
Swaps health levels with an enemy target. There is a minimum health percentage that enemies can be brought down to and a minimum amount of health received based on victims current health.
description.quip: Swap your current health with an enemy hero's
description.t2_desc: On cast, +40% Fire Rate for 0s.
description.t3_desc: Silence enemies within 15m for 3s

description.desc: Throw a blade, dealing Spirit Damage. The blade then hooks back, applying Spirit Damage again and applying a Slow.
description.quip: Throw a blade that returns to you
description.t3_desc: Throw an additional 2 Daggers

description.desc: Transform yourself into a tornado that travels forward, damaging enemies and lifting them up in the air. After emerging from the tornado you gain bullet evasion.
description.quip: Transform yourself into a tornado that lifts enemies

description.desc: Deal additional Weapon Damage when in close range to your target.
Create a time warping wall that stops time for all enemy projectiles and bullets that touch it. Enemies that touch the wall will be briefly slowed.
description.quip: Create a wall that greatly slows projectiles
description.t1_desc:
+2m Width,
+1m Height
description.t2_desc: +10% Max Health Damage on Touch
description.t3_desc: Enemies that touch Time Wall will be Silenced for 2.5s

description.desc: Teleport to an enemy target, dealing damage, applying Disarm, Slow, and pulls them to the ground.
Become immune to bullets.

Your bullets have a chance to be empowered, causing them to deal bonus weapon damage and Slow on hit.
Bonus damage cannot Crit.
Target an enemy. You and the target enemy are bound on Stage, unable to leave. All other characters are pushed out of the radius.
Your Weapon Damage increases as you take sustained damage.

Dash forward before slashing all enemies in a circle, dealing Light Melee Damage.

If the ability hits at least one target, heal a small amount of health.
description.quip: Dash forward and slash enemies
description.t3_desc: -50% Cooldown On Hit

description.desc: Your Melee attacks heal you for 18% of the Melee Damage dealt plus 90. This heal is 30% effective vs non-heroes.
Deal damage to nearby enemies and heal yourself based on the damage done. Heal is stronger against enemy heroes.
description.quip: Damage enemies nearby, healing from each hit
description.t3_desc: Adds a debuff to enemies that lets Mo & Krill deal +15% Damage to them. Stacks and lasts 16s.

description.desc:
Perform a dash forward, damaging enemies along the path.

Ultimate Unlock: While rage is full an echo of Shiv retraces the dash path after a short delay, damaging enemies again.
description.quip: Dash ahead, damaging all enemies along the path
description.t3_desc: Reduce cooldown by 2s per enemy hero hit (1s for Non-Hero). Max -6s per Dash.

description.desc: You have increased Slide Distance, can Slide up hills, and can turn faster while Sliding.
description.quip: Increase the agility of your Slide
description.t3_desc: +25% Spirit & Bullet Resist while Sliding

description.desc: Gain bonuses and automatically connect with a nearby ally to share them. Healing is replicated among all those connected. Connection requires line of sight. Press [Ability 2] to Lock on to a target
description.quip: Empower yourself and a nearby ally
description.t2_desc: +2.0m/s movement bonus

description.desc: Take only a portion of incoming damage immediately and defer the rest to be taken over time. Activate to clear a portion of the deferred damage.
description.quip: Defer a portion of damage taken

description.desc: Your bullets build up to apply a burning effect on enemies. Infernus's bullets and abilities will refresh the duration.
description.quip: Shoot enemies to set them on fire
description.t1_desc: Victims deal -25% Spirit Damage.

description.desc:
Throw an explosive bola. On exploding, the bola Slows and Damages all enemies in the area.

Direct hits deal additional Damage and Petrify instead.

Petrified units block all damage, but cannot take actions.
Petrified units break free after blocking enough damage.
description.quip: Toss a petrifying bola
description.t3_desc: +1.0s Petrify Duration. Petrifies all enemies in the area.

description.desc: Automatically restores one stamina and deploy temporary Bullet and Spirit Shields when you are movement locked, Stunned, Chained, Immobilized, or Slept.
Curse an enemy hero. If they don't move away from their initial position within the escape time, they will be damaged and immobilized.
description.quip: Curse your target, rooting them if they don't escape
description.t3_desc: Warden deals +20% more Bullet Damage to trapped Heroes for 6s

description.desc: Grant Regen and Sprint Speed to the target. Gets dispelled if you take damage from enemy players or objectives. Can be self-cast.

Creates a wall that divides the terrain in half. On creation, the wall deals damage and applies slow to enemies nearby.
After casting, press [LMC] or [Ability 3] to erupt the wall early.
description.quip: Conjure a wall to block your foes
description.t1_desc: Removes 1 stamina and amplifies McGinnis's damage by 15% on hit enemies for 7s
description.t3_desc: Adds a 1s Stun to enemies hit by Spectral Wall

description.desc: Leap into the air and fly. While in flight your weapon deals bonus spirit damage.
description.quip: Take flight and empower your weapon
description.t1_desc: +50% base Ammo while flying

description.desc: Gain Spirit Power and Spirit Lifesteal.
Become Stealthed. Whenever you take damage while Stealthed you get briefly revealed.
Heals a target allied hero and yourself for a percentage of Max Health. Once while healing, you can Pull the target towards you. Can be self-cast.

Deals Spirit Damage, Slows targets movement and dashes. Also Silences their movement-based items and abilities.
Does not affect target's stamina usage.

description.quip: Travel to a low health hero and instantly kill it
description.t1_desc: Gain +2 m/s move speed while at full rage.
description.t2_desc: +6% Enemy Health Threshold and +8% Full Rage Bonus Damage
description.t3_desc: Finishing off an enemy with Killing Blow resets its cooldown.

description.desc: Temporarily boosts your fire rate. Nearby allies receive half the fire rate bonus.
description.quip: Boost your fire rate
description.t3_desc: +20% Bullet and Spirit Lifesteal and Increased Scaling on Spirit Damage Per Bullet

description.desc:
Throw a harpoon that latches to a wall or ceiling, and pulls you in. Activates Lurker's Ambush's invisibility while being pulled in. Once hanging attached to the harpoon surface, gain additional charges.

Casting Reefdweller Harpoon does not break invisibility.
description.quip: Throw a harpoon to pull yourself towards a surface.
description.t3_desc: After detaching, gain 30% Fire Rate for 7s or until you reload

description.desc: Spray sand that disarms enemies in front of you and deals damage.
description.quip: Disarm enemies in front of you
description.t3_desc: Slow targets by -40%

description.desc: Hold the target in place, stunning them and dealing damage during the channel. If they die during, or within 3 seconds of Combo ending, you permanently gain max health.
description.quip: Hold the enemy hero in place and pummel them
description.t1_desc: +0% Bullet Resist during Combo
description.t2_desc: Combo Duration +0.75s
description.t3_desc: +40 Damage Per Second and 100% lifesteal

description.desc: When you deal Spirit Damage to enemies, you also apply Fire Rate Slow.
Launch out a hook that grabs and reels in the first hero it hits and deals damage to enemies. Target will be placed where you are facing.
description.quip: Pull in a target to you
description.t1_desc: Bebop deals 25% more weapon damage against hooked enemies for 10s

description.desc:
Throw a flask that explodes on contact, creating an area that does increasing Spirit Damage per second and causes enemies to receive additional Weapon Damage from your team.

50% less effective vs non-heroes.

Kelvin creates a floating trail of ice and snow that gives movement bonuses to him and his allies. Kelvin gains 60% slow resistance for the duration. Enemies can also walk on the floating trail.
Press [Dash] / [Crouch/Slide] to travel up or down while in Ice Path.
description.quip: Speed around on a floating path of ice
description.t3_desc: While active, gain +1 Spirit Power per meter of Ice Path trail created.  Max of 55 Spirit Power

description.desc: Release an expanding ice blast that deals Spirit Damage and Slows targets it hits. Deals 2x Damage to non-Heroes.
Launch a sentient cloak that travels forward and damages enemies. You can press [Ability 2] to teleport to its location.
description.quip: Launch a damaging cloak that you can teleport to
description.t3_desc: +7 Weapon Damage for 10s after teleporting with Flying Cloak.

description.desc: Abilities deal bonus Spirit Damage if they deal 80 damage or more in a single hit.
Deal weapon damage to summon cards.  Activate to throw a card that flies towards the enemy or point under your crosshair.
description.quip: Throw homing cards

description.desc: Deal bonus Weapon Damage with headshots.

Dynamo briefly disappears into the void and then reappears a short distance away. On reappearing, your weapon is reloaded and has a fire rate bonus for the next clip (Max 8s). Can be Alt-Cast to also bring nearby allies and give them half fire rate bonus.
description.quip: Blink in and out of existence
description.t3_desc: -5s Ability Cooldown and +120% Base Ammo when reappearing

description.desc: Your bullets apply Movement Slow and reduce the target's outgoing damage on hit.
Your crow familiar deals impact damage, reduces their bullet resist and applies a bleed that deals damage based on the target's current health.
description.quip: Make a target bleed over time
description.t1_desc: Crow Ricochets up to 2 times towards other enemies within 15m
description.t3_desc: -12% Bullet Resist and -6% Spirit Resist

description.desc:
Create a hexed area on the ground. After a delay, ALL units in the cylindrical area are Petrified. Enemies also suffer Spirit Damage.

Petrified units block all damage, but cannot take actions.
Petrified units break free after blocking enough damage.
description.quip: Turn both allies and enemies into stone

description.desc:
Instantly turn to shadows, becoming Untargetable, gaining Movement Speed, and dealing Damage.

After 3s, return from the shadows, dealing Damage again.
description.quip: Turn to Shadows, gaining movespeed and dealing delayed damage
description.t3_desc: Reset all cooldowns and gain 30% Damage Amp for 5ss.

description.active: Consume all stacks to heal target ally and replenish a stamina point. Can be self-cast.
description.passive: When an enemy uses an ability within 50mm range from you, store one Restoration Stack.

description.desc: Channel an expanding storm cloud around you that damages all enemies within its radius. Enemies do not take damage when they are out of line-of-sight. You have increased Bullet Resist during the channel.
description.quip: Fry all enemies in a large area
description.t1_desc: +35% Bullet Resist while channeling Storm Cloud
description.t2_desc: +7s Channel Time and +10m Radius
description.t3_desc: +75 DPS and allows movement control

description.desc: Your attacks have additional Weapon Damage against enemies above 50% health.
When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Spirit Resist reduced.
When in close range to your target, gain Weapon Damage and your bullets apply a Movement Slow.
Provides Fire Rate to nearby player minions.
description.active: Provides bonus Move Speed and Fire Rate to you and nearby allies.

description.desc:
Abilities deal bonus Spirit Damage if they deal 175 damage or more in a single hit.
Targets are immune to the effects of Improved Burst for 5s after taking damage from it.
Deploy a spirit that heals nearby units.
description.quip: Deploy a healing spirit
description.t1_desc: +35% Fire Rate on units being healed by Medicinal Specter
description.t3_desc: +4.5% Max Health regen per second

description.desc: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.
Create a large ball of scrap, damaging and stunning the first enemy hit. Nearby enemies take reduced damage.
Active: Consume multiplier of Djinn's Mark to deal its damage now.
description.quip: Apply procs of escalating damage
description.t1_desc: Apply 80% Slow for 0.5s whenever you apply 2x multiplier or higher
description.t2_desc: +4.0s Multiplier Duration and +10 Base Damage
description.t3_desc: 2.5s Cooldown Between Multiplier and +8 Max Multiplier

description.desc: Gain bonus Fire Rate and Spirit Power by charging up when shooting enemy heroes.

Drop a bounce pad in the world that launches any hero.

You explode on landing, dealing Damage to any nearby enemies. The explosion can only occur once per Bounce Pad.
description.quip: Send yourself and others flying
description.t1_desc: You and allies gain a +4m/s move speed bonus for 4s on landing
description.t2_desc: +100 Stomp Damage. Improve Spirit scaling
description.t3_desc: +1.25s Stun on landing

description.desc: Respawns the hero at the spot they died.
After dealing an accumulated 200 spirit damage, your next Heavy Melee Attack deals an additional 200 spirit damage.

Shoot freezing cold energy out in front of you, damaging targets and building up movement and fire rate slow against them the longer you sustain the beam on them. You have reduced move speed while using Arctic Beam. The beam may also claim Souls.
description.quip: Apply an escalating slow
description.t3_desc: Fires 2 additional Arctic Beams toward enemies within 13m of the last target hit

description.desc: Slash enemies in front of you, damaging them and slowing their fire rate. If any enemy heroes are hit, you heal.
description.quip: Damage enemies nearby, healing on hit

description.desc: Burrow underground, moving faster, and gaining spirit and bullet armor. Damage from enemy heroes will reduce the speed bonus. When you jump out, knock enemies into the air and perform a spin attack that damages and slows. Cooldown starts when Burrow ends.
description.quip: Travel underground, emerging with spin damage
description.t1_desc: Burrow time +3s
description.t2_desc: +140 Spin DPS and +2 radius
description.t3_desc: -19.0 Cooldown and +2m/s Move Speed

description.desc: Increases Weapon Damage as you continuously fire your weapon.
Gain Bullet and Spirit Resist, and slow the move and dash speed of enemies nearby. Your model size grows by 20%.
Fade out of sight, becoming invisible and gaining sprint speed. Attacking removes invisibility, but using items does not. Close enemies can see through your invisibility.
description.quip: Fade out of sight
description.t2_desc: After invis, gain +15% Bullet Lifesteal for 8s
description.t3_desc: Enable Ability Charges and Phase out of the world for +0.5s

description.desc: Reduces the effect of enemy Movement Slow.
Throw a knife that damages and bleeds an enemy. Each additional hit adds a stack and refreshes the bleed duration, causing the bleed to increase per stack.
description.quip: Apply stacking bleed to the target
description.t3_desc: +40 Damage and +7 Bleed DPS

description.desc: Grants Bullet Resist when your bullets hit an enemy hero. Each shot can only grant one stack.
Your bullets will ricochet on enemies near your target, applying any bullet procs and dealing a percentage of the original damage.
Reduces nearby enemies' Bullet Resist and Fire Rate. If there is only one enemy hero nearby, this effect is tripled.
Launch a flying shadow copy of yourself that you control, teleporting your original body to wherever it lands. The teleport explosion slows enemies and deals damage based on how long you were flying.
description.quip: Launch a flying illusion of yourself, teleporting your real body where the illusion lands

description.desc:
Attach a Sticky Bomb to a nearby target that deals explosive damage after a short fuse time.

Gain +1.5% bomb damage for every enemy hero hurt.
Gain +4% bomb damage for every enemy hero killed within 12.0s of taking bomb damage.

Hold [M3] to attach the Sticky Bomb to yourself.
description.quip: Plant a bomb on an enemy
description.t3_desc: On Attach, target deals -30% less damage for 5s

description.desc:
Create a Copy of yourself with reduced health and damage. When the clone dies or expires it explodes, dealing Spirit Damage.

The Copy cannot use their Ultimate ability.
description.t3_desc: Copy can cast their Ultimate Ability.

description.desc:
You enter a void state and become untargetable and invincible for a short duration, during which you float slowly and cannot perform actions. Afterwards you gain move speed, spirit and spirit resist.
Cancels any active ability.

description.active: Become Stealthed. Whenever you take damage while Stealthed you get briefly revealed.

description.desc: Throw a grappling hook to reel yourself towards an enemy, damaging and slowing the target when you arrive.
description.quip: Fly towards an enemy target
description.t3_desc: Can Grapple to ally Heroes and +6 Weapon Damage for 10s

description.desc: Increases the effectiveness of your healing by 25% and increases your resistance to healing reduction by 15%.
Your Spirit Damage applies Healing Reduction. If an enemy hero dies under this effect, you receive a large heal.

Channeled. Target an ally or visible enemy hero on the minimap, then teleport to where they were when your channel started. After teleporting, you gain move speed as well as fire rate until your next reload.
description.quip: Teleport to an ally or enemy hero
description.t2_desc: Grants Traveller Buffs to Ally
description.t3_desc: On arrival, become Immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm for 3s.

description.desc:
Performing a Dash or Slide loads your weapon with an empowered bullet that deals bonus Damage, equal to a percentage of your Weapon Damage.

If you're out of bullets, you'll find an extra one. How lucky.
description.t1_desc: Gain +2 m/s Move Speed while empowered
description.t2_desc: Deal an additional +25% weapon damage for 5s against the victim

description.desc: Curses an enemy - interrupting, Silencing, Disarming, and preventing item usage.
Throw a flask that damages, slows movement, and reduces the weapon damage of enemies it hits.
description.quip: Damage and debuff enemies nearby
description.t1_desc: Hit enemies lose 1 Stamina
description.t3_desc: -6.5s Cooldown and Weapon Debuff applies 35% Fire Rate Slow

description.desc: Pull yourself through the air toward a target. Using Grapple also resets your limit of air jumps and dashes.
description.quip: Use your whip to pull yourself to an enemy
description.t2_desc: +20m Cast Range and gain +6 Weapon Damage for 10s
description.t3_desc: +20% Fire Rate to Weapon Bonus Buff

description.desc: Throw a jar that leaves a pool of poison, dealing Damage and Slowing. The pool spreads over time, growing in size.
description.t1_desc: Victims deal -20% Spirit Damage

description.desc: When you are above 65% health, deal additional Weapon Damage.

After charging for 2s, release pulses that damage enemies and heal you based on the damage done.
While channeling Last Stand you have greatly increased bullet and spirit resist. Goes on a reduced cooldown if interrupted while charging.
description.quip: Emit pulses that steal health from enemies
description.t2_desc:
+70 DPS
-35.0s Cooldown
description.t3_desc:
+50.0% Bullet Resist
+50.0% Spirit Resist
+2.5s Duration

description.desc: Increases the duration of your abilities and items.
Launch forward, damaging all enemies near where you land and knocking them into the air.
description.quip: Launch forward into enemies

description.desc: Briefly gain Fire Rate and Move Speed when one of your bullets hits an enemy hero.
Gain a spirit shield and bonus move speed.
description.quip: Gain a spirit shield and move speed
description.t3_desc: +200 Spirit Shield Health and now scales with Spirit Power

description.desc: Summon a Magic Carpet that will fly you away and gain Bullet and Spirit shields.  Cannot use abilities while the carpet is being summoned.  While flying you are immune to slows and doing any action will dismiss the carpet.
Upon casting an ultimate ability gain temporary Bullet Shield, Spirit Shield, and Spirit Power.
Charge forward, colliding with enemies and dragging them along. Hitting a wall will Stun enemies caught by Abrams. Speed increased after colliding with enemy Heroes.
description.quip: Charge into the fray, dragging enemies along
description.t3_desc: +5.5 Weapon Damage for 8s after colliding with an enemy

description.desc: Passively mark nearby enemies with a Brand. Shooting an enemy with a Brand consumes the effect, dealing bonus Damage and granting Fire Rate and Movement Speed.

Release a wave of spectral spiders that chase enemies and explode, dealing Spirit Damage.

Hit enemies are poisoned, temporarily losing Spirit and Spirit Resist. This effect can stack multiple times.
description.t2_desc: Additional -3 Spirit and -3% Spirit Resistance
description.t3_desc: Summon +5 Spiders

description.desc: Fire a projectile that swaps your position with the target enemy hero. While the effect occurs, you gain spirit lifesteal and the enemy takes damage over time.
description.quip: Swap positions with an enemy hero.

description.desc: Target an enemy to apply Fire Rate Slow and reduce their Bullet Resist.

Throw a dagger that damages and sleeps the target. Sleeping targets wake up shortly after being damaged. Throwing a Dagger does not break your invisibility. Sleep Dagger does not interrupt enemies' channeling abilities.
description.quip: Put an enemy to sleep
description.t1_desc: Removes 1 stamina
description.t3_desc: Applies -12% Bullet Resist and 40% Fire Rate Slow for 6s on wake-up.

description.desc: Increases the Duration of your abilities and items.

Deals % Current Health damage, and then applies damage over time to all enemies nearby.
Affliction's damage is non-lethal and does not apply item procs.
description.quip: Apply damage over time to enemies nearby
description.t2_desc: Suppress targets' healing by -50%
description.t3_desc: +12 DPS, +5% Current Health Damage and +5m Radius

description.desc: Heal yourself and nearby allies. Heals an additional 20% per ally.
Reduces Bullet Resist on enemies when you deal Spirit Damage.
Lift an enemy hero into the air, stunning them, then slam them into the ground. Targets are silenced and disarmed afterwards.
description.quip: Lift an enemy, interrupting and silencing them
description.t3_desc: Telekinesis will bounce to an additional nearby target

description.desc:
Throw a projectile, infused with an imp's spirit. It posseses the enemy, dealing Damage over time.

If the target dies while possessed, the imp jumps to another nearby enemy, refreshing its duration.
description.t3_desc: +25 DPS. Spreads to +1 targets after death.

description.desc: Dealing Spirit Damage applies a stacking Spirit Amp that increases your Spirit Damage to the target.
Deal Light Melee damage to nearby units and send them flying back, causing area damage and fire rate slow where they land. Does not damage allies.
description.quip: Punch someone away from you
description.t2_desc: On Uppercut enemy Hero, gain fast spin-up time, 2x range, and +50% weapon damage for 12s
description.t3_desc: On Uppercut enemy Hero, set Hook cooldown to 0 and instantly +100% bullets to your current clip

description.desc: Prepare three AMAZING bolts of magic. Each bolt applies a Fading Slow and deals Spirit Damage, increased for every bolt fired.
description.t3_desc: +50 Damage Per Bolt. Refund 1 Bolt per Kill

description.active: For the next 4s, all your bullets immediately apply Silence. Silence prevents targets from using abilities.

description.desc:
Deploy a Mini Turret that automatically shoots enemies. The turret expires after a limited lifetime.
Turrets gain 30HP per Boon. They deal reduced damage to troopers and objectives.
description.quip: Deploy an automated turret
description.t1_desc: Turrets apply +25% Movement Slow
description.t2_desc: +10m Attack Range and +10% turret fire rate

description.desc:
Reduces healing received of targeted enemy and inflicts damage over time of their current health.
Decay's damage is non-lethal.
Provide the target with Bullet Shield, Spirit Shield, and Move Speed. Can be self-cast.

Fire a bolt of magic that deals Damage and applies a Fire Rate Slow. If you have an Assistant, they also cast Vexing Bolt at reduced damage.

Press [Ability 1] to redirect the bolt towards your crosshairs.
description.quip: Launch a guided bolt of magic
description.t3_desc: +110 Damage. Your Assistant casts Vexing Bolt without reductions

description.desc:
Throw out your lasso, dealing Damage and grabbing the first enemy hit. Grabbed enemies are Stunned and dragged along behind you.

While Spirit Lasso is active, Holliday cannot melee or shoot.
description.quip: Grab an enemy and drag them behind you

description.desc: When you perform a Light or Heavy Melee attack against a hero, the attack deals extra Spirit Damage and steals Spirit Resist and Spirit Power.
Sacrifice some of your health to launch blood shards that apply a stack of Malice. Each stack slows the victim and increases the damage they take from you. The slow effect decreases over time.
description.quip: Stack damage amplification on an enemy
description.t2_desc: +40 Health To Damage and +7% Damage Amp
description.t3_desc: +6 Blood Shards

description.desc:
After 1.5s cast time, launch a spirit owl that you control and which explodes on impact, damaging and stunning enemies. Hold [LMC] to accelerate the owl.
Press [Jump/Mantle] to release control. Gain permanent Spirit Power for each enemy hero killed with Guided Owl.
description.quip: Fly your owl to damage enemies from afar
description.t3_desc: After hit, kills enemies that are below 22% Health

description.desc: Throw a ball of goo that deals damage and leaves puddles of goo behind that apply movement slow to enemies in the radius.
description.quip: Damage enemies and make a mess
description.t2_desc: +50 Damage and +1m Radius
description.t3_desc: Bounces 2 times

description.desc:
Load your weapon with demonic rounds. After a delay, release a blitz of bullets at the target enemy, dealing bonus Damage.

Enemies can intercept the bullets.

Channel to increase damage over 1.4 seconds, then release a fully-charged sword strike.
Press [Ability 1] or [LMC] to trigger the strike early, dealing partial damage.
description.quip: Charge up an attack, dealing high damage on a full charge
description.t1_desc: Gain +60 Bullet Resist while channeling
description.t2_desc: -2s Ability Cooldown and apply 40% movement slow for 3s

description.desc: Reduces the Cooldown of your abilities and items.
Teleport straight ahead, gaining Bullet Resist.

Become infused with Yamato's shadow soul. After an initial invincible transformation your abilities are refreshed and are 60% faster. You gain immunity to negative status effects and have greatly increased bullet and spirit resist.
When you get a hero kill, you heal and the duration is extended.
description.quip: Become invincible and more powerful
description.t3_desc:
+3.0s Duration
+20% Bullet Resist
+20% Spirit Resist

description.desc: Apply a barrier to a target ally, granting Spirit Shield. As long as the shield holds, it periodically deals Spirit Damage and Slows.
Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.

Temporarily suppress negative status effects and become immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm.
Cannot be used while Stunned or Slept.
Create a thread of web between two surfaces. Enemies who touch the web take Damage and are Slowed.
description.t3_desc: The Web also Silences for 2.5s

description.desc: Automatically fire a bullet towards any attacker who damages you with their abilities or weapon.

Send a Spirit Cat forward that grab's targets in its way. Grabbing a Hero will cause an explosion soon after.
Press [Ability 1] to manually create the explosion.
description.quip: Send out a Spirit Cat to grab enemies

description.active: Gain bonus Move Speed and Ammo.
description.passive: Removes the Move Speed penalty while shooting.

description.desc: Shoots out a blast of consumed remains, damaging and slowing enemies. Multiple hits increase the slow.
description.quip: Shoot a blast of bio mass

description.desc: Create an area that slows nearby enemies and damages them after a channel. Damage scales with total channel time.
description.quip: Slow and Damage nearby enemies

description.desc:
Inject a target with lethal venom. After a delay the venom triggers, dealing Spirit Damage. The damage is increased by the target's missing health.

Reapplying Venom refreshes the duration.
Venom breaks Petrify before detonating.
description.quip: Inject your enemies with a deadly venom
description.t3_desc: Bullets also build up Lethal Venom

description.desc:
Launches you high in the air, allowing you to glide slowly. While airborne, you gain Weapon Damage and multishot on your weapon.
Alt-Cast for reduced jump height.
Press [Jump/Mantle] to cancel the glide.
description.quip: Jump high up in the air and unleash multishots
description.t2_desc: While airborne, +5 Weapon Damage and weapon damage applies 40% movement slow for 1.5s
description.t3_desc: While airborne, +40% Bullet Lifesteal and +40% Spirit Lifesteal

description.desc:
Leap at a target to inflict Light Melee damage and slow on nearby enemies.
You may use Pounce on a second target if used within 3s
description.quip: Leap at your enemies
description.t1_desc: +1s Slow Duration
description.t2_desc: Reloads up to 20% of your ammo and applies +30% Fire Rate Slow.
description.t3_desc: +60 Damage and +1 Ability Charge.

description.desc: Unleashes a volley of rockets that home in on a targeted location.
description.quip: Bombard an area with rockets
description.t1_desc: Applies 30% movement slow
description.t3_desc: +30 Damage per Rocket

description.desc:
Move forward at high speed and leave a flame trail that burns enemies. Infernus gains 50% slow resistance for the duration.
Hold [LMC] to dash faster.
description.quip: Blaze forward, leaving a flame trail in your wake
description.t1_desc: +30% Fire Rate Slow for 6s
description.t3_desc: Enable Ability Charges and -15.0s Ability Cooldown

description.desc: Stomp the ground beneath you, damaging enemies in front of you. If you perform Ground Strike while airborne, you quickly dive towards the ground. Damage grows slower after 25m.
description.quip: Slam down to the ground, damaging enemies
description.t2_desc: Struck enemies are popped into the air and slowed by 50% for 3s
description.t3_desc: Damage Per Meter +110% and improved scaling

description.desc: After not taking damage for 10s, gain 4% Max Health Regen.
Turn yourself into impervious stone and smash into the ground, stunning and damaging enemies nearby. Heals you for a percentage of your max health. You have some air control before falling.
description.quip: Turn into impervious stone and stun enemies nearby
description.t2_desc: +80 Damage and stuns for 0.5s.

description.desc: Your bullets build up a Bleed on enemies, causing them to lose a percentage of their Max Health over time. Also applies Healing Reduction on the bleeding target.
Reduces the duration of all negative effects applied to you.
description.active:
Purge all negative effects currently applied to you. If any effects were removed, heal yourself and gain a move speed bonus.
Cannot be used while Stunned or Slept.

description.desc: Start launching fire scarabs. Each scarab can be launched separately, stealing max health from enemies over time and applying bullet resist reduction. Applying multiple scarabs to the same enemy will extend the health stealing duration. The health gain from hitting heroes is 3x as effective as against non-heroes.
description.quip: Send out scarabs that steal life from enemies

description.desc: Escape into your suitcase. When the duration ends, deal damage to nearby enemies. Duration can be ended early by performing any action.
description.quip: Briefly escape into your suitcase, then deal damage
description.t3_desc: Applies 40% Fire Rate Slow for 4.0s and +1.5s Escape Duration

description.desc: Release an energy pulse that knocks enemies up into the air.
description.quip: Release a ground pulse that knocks enemies into the air
description.t1_desc: Hit enemies are fire rate and movement slowed by 35% for 4s.
description.t2_desc: Dynamo deals 30% more Weapon Damage to hit enemies for 8s

description.desc: Encase the target in a cube of restorative goo that protects from damage, and increases health regen. Target is unable to take any new actions while cubed. Can be used on self. Press [Jump/Mantle] to escape early.
description.quip: The Cube is a safe place to be
description.t1_desc: Increases Move Speed and Stamina Recovery
description.t3_desc: Removes all Debuffs and -21.0s Cooldown

description.desc:
Kelvin freezes the air around him, creating an impenetrable dome around himself. While in the dome, allies rapidly regenerate health and enemies are slowed.
Objectives becomes Invulnerable and Frozen under Frozen Shelter.
description.quip: Create an impenetrable healing dome
description.t1_desc: +40% Fire Rate Slow
description.t3_desc: +60 Health Regen and now scales with Spirit Power

description.desc: Charge up your laser to unleash a powerful torrent of energy that deals damage and slows enemies' movement and dashes. You have slow movement and turn rate for the duration. If activated in the air, you will hover while unleashing the beam.
description.quip: Unleash a massive damaging beam
description.t3_desc: Hyper Beam heals Bebop for 80% of its damage on Heroes. 25% on non-hero

description.desc: Your next bullet will heal you based on what target you hit.
Throws out her hat to strike enemies, slowing and revealing them through walls.
description.quip: Throws her hat strike and reveal enemies

description.desc: While you have a Spirit Shield, gain bonus Spirit Power and Cooldown Reduction.
Your next Dash-Jump does not cost an extra stamina and you gain Fire Rate and bonus Ammo until your next reload. Lasts up to 7s.

description.passive: If you die, after 4s you will respawn at your death location with partial health.

description.desc: Landing a headshot deals bonus damage, heals you for a portion of your Max HP, and briefly grants you bonus move speed.
Create a large ball of scrap that can be thrown, damaging and stunning the first enemy hit. The ball takes time to create and you move slower while carrying it.
description.quip: Throw a ball of scrap that stuns enemies

description.desc: Drain health from enemies in front of you while they are in the radius.
description.quip: Drain health from enemies in front of you

description.desc: Your bullets apply a debuff that amplifies your Spirit Damage and grants you Spirit Lifesteal against targets. Landing a headshot increases your total Spirit Amp against them.

Mark your enemies and bathe yourself in shadow to strengthen your attacks and make yourself Invisible. Attacking will only temporarily reveal you. Hitting enemies with Melee damage will reduce their bullet resist (stacking)
description.quip: Enter the shadows to gain the advantage on your enemies
description.t2_desc: +40% Slow Resist while Active
description.t3_desc: Heavy Melee attacks cause Silence for 3s

description.desc: Summon a patch of choking vines that damages and slows enemies in its radius.
description.quip: Damage and slow enemies in the area
description.t3_desc: +50 DPS and +2m Radius

description.desc:
Throw a cluster of bombs that detonate after a delay, dealing Damage.

Enemies hit by multiple bombs take 50% damage.
description.quip: Throw out cluster bombs

description.desc: Teleport to the targeted location.
description.quip: Teleport to the targeted location
description.t2_desc: Provides a 300 bullet shield for 8s on teleport. Shield amount scales with Spirit Power.

description.desc:
Headshots deal bonus Damage and applies a Fading Slow. This effect can only occur when off cooldown.

Cooldown is reduced by 50% on NPC hits.
Crackshot ignores range damage fall-off and does not apply to objectives.
description.quip: Deal bonus damage with headshots
description.t3_desc: -4s Cooldown on Hero Headshots. -2s on NPC Headshots

description.desc: Morph into a large goo ball that deals damage and stuns enemies on impact. The ball grants large amounts of Bullet and Spirit resist, bounces off walls and can double jump.
description.quip: Roll around and cause chaos
description.t3_desc: Can cast abilities and use items while rolling

description.desc: Use your umbrella to catch a gust of wind that lifts you backwards.  You then charge up your umbrella to fire a projectile that explodes on impact.
description.t2_desc: [Not Yet Implemented]
description.t3_desc: [Not Yet Implemented]

description.desc: Target an enemy NPC and consume it for 150% Bonus Souls and grants a powerful long lasting buff.

section_attributes.loc_string: Target an enemy NPC and consume it for 150% Bonus Souls and grants a powerful long lasting buff.

description.desc: Release an expanding ice blast that deals Spirit Damage, Freezing and then Slowing targets it hits. Targets take increased damage while frozen.

section_attributes.loc_string: Release an expanding ice blast that deals Spirit Damage, Freezing and then Slowing targets it hits. Targets take increased damage while frozen.

description.desc: Whenever you score an assist or kill, gain extra health, sprint, ability range and passive soul generation. This effect stacks and persists through death.

section_attributes.loc_string: Whenever you score an assist or kill, gain extra health, sprint, ability range and passive soul generation. This effect stacks and persists through death.

description.desc:
Dealing significant Spirit Damage to an enemy within 5s causes an explosion dealing damage and a burn to nearby enemies. While burning, enemies take damage over time and receive reduced healing.
Deals half-damage to non-heroes and does not expend its cooldown unless a hero is hit.

section_attributes.loc_string:
Dealing significant Spirit Damage to an enemy within 5s causes an explosion dealing damage and a burn to nearby enemies. While burning, enemies take damage over time and receive reduced healing.
Deals half-damage to non-heroes and does not expend its cooldown unless a hero is hit.

description.desc: Landing a Headshot on Heroes reduces their Bullet Resist.

section_attributes.loc_string: Landing a Headshot on Heroes reduces their Bullet Resist.

description.desc: Dealing Spirit Damage to enemy Heroes grants you Bonus Health Regen. Stacks when dealing damage to different heroes.

section_attributes.loc_string: Dealing Spirit Damage to enemy Heroes grants you Bonus Health Regen. Stacks when dealing damage to different heroes.

description.desc:
Make your weapon fire multishot.

Hitting more than one Hero per attack will grant a stacking weapon damage bonus.

Targets can only be hit once per multishot.

section_attributes.loc_string:
Make your weapon fire multishot.

Hitting more than one Hero per attack will grant a stacking weapon damage bonus.

Targets can only be hit once per multishot.

description.desc: Heal and gain bonus Movement Speed for a short duration when you cast an ability.

section_attributes.loc_string: Dealing Spirit Damage to enemy Heroes grants you Bonus Health Regen. Stacks when dealing damage to different heroes.
Heal and gain bonus Movement Speed for a short duration when you cast an ability.

description.desc: After not attacking for 4s, your next attack will fire twice in quick succession with increased damage and velocity. This attack consumes extra ammo.

section_attributes.loc_string: After not attacking for 4s, your next attack will fire twice in quick succession with increased damage and velocity. This attack consumes extra ammo.

description.active: Grants Fire Rate and Spirit Resistance but Silences you and disables stamina usage and regeneration.

section_attributes.loc_string: Grants Fire Rate and Spirit Resistance but Silences you and disables stamina usage and regeneration.

description.desc: On a successful Parry against an enemy Hero, Heal yourself for the damage parried and returns that damage to the target, and temporarily gain increased melee damage.

section_attributes.loc_string: On a successful Parry against an enemy Hero, Heal yourself for the damage parried and returns that damage to the target, and temporarily gain increased melee damage.

description.desc: Target an enemy to reduce their Spirit Resist and Spirit Power.

section_attributes.loc_string: Target an enemy to reduce their Spirit Resist and Spirit Power.

description.desc:
Whenever you cast an ability or item, gain a stacking buff that improves fire rate and reload speed.
Each stack refreshes the duration.

section_attributes.loc_string:
Whenever you cast an ability or item, gain a stacking buff that improves fire rate and reload speed.
Each stack refreshes the duration.

description.desc:
Your melee damage will restore ammo and apply a stacking bullet resist debuff on enemies. Heavy melee applies 2 stacks.

If the target reaches max stacks, they will be stunned.

section_attributes.loc_string: Your next Heavy Melee attack against an enemy deals increased damage.

Your melee damage will restore ammo and apply a stacking bullet resist debuff on enemies. Heavy melee applies 2 stacks.

If the target reaches max stacks, they will be stunned.

description.desc: Your next parry protects you from the damage and effects of enemy abilities and items. On a successful spell parry gain Move Speed and Spirit Power.

section_attributes.loc_string: Your next parry protects you from the damage and effects of enemy abilities and items. On a successful spell parry gain Move Speed and Spirit Power.

description.desc: Your Bullets have a chance to become unavoidable, piercing through enemies and ignoring their Bullet Resistance.

section_attributes.loc_string: Your Bullets have a chance to become unavoidable, piercing through enemies and ignoring their Bullet Resistance.

description.desc: Target an enemy to silence them. A portion of all damage dealt during the silence gets applied to the target when the silence wears off.

section_attributes.loc_string: Target an enemy to silence them. A portion of all damage dealt during the silence gets applied to the target when the silence wears off.

description.desc: Disarms enemy target and reduces their Bullet Resist.

section_attributes.loc_string: Disarms enemy target and reduces their Bullet Resist.
Enemies that shoot you have their Fire Rate slowed.
This effect can only trigger once per target per ultimate, and cannot activate on ultimates with charges.

description.desc: The next instance of high spirit damage you take is significantly reduced.

section_attributes.loc_string: The next instance of high spirit damage you take is significantly reduced.

description.desc: Toggle: Continually sacrifice Health to improve fire rate, Debuff Resistance and Move Speed. Healing received is reduced during the sacrifice.

section_attributes.loc_string: Toggle: Continually sacrifice Health to improve fire rate, Debuff Resistance and Move Speed. Healing received is reduced during the sacrifice.

description.desc:
Provide the target with a Barrier and temporary Move Speed.
Can be self-cast.
Cooldown is reduced by half when cast on someone else.

section_attributes.loc_string:
Provide the target with a Barrier and temporary Move Speed.
Can be self-cast.
Cooldown is reduced by half when cast on someone else.

description.desc:
Applying heal to yourself or an ally grants the target bonus fire rate and bonus move speed.

Does not apply on innate Regen or innate Bullet/Spirit Lifesteal.

section_attributes.loc_string:
Applying heal to yourself or an ally grants the target bonus fire rate and bonus move speed.

Does not apply on innate Regen or innate Bullet/Spirit Lifesteal.

description.desc:
Remove all non-stun debuffs from the target and provide them with a Barrier and Move Speed.
Can be self-cast. Cooldown is reduced by half when cast on someone else.

section_attributes.loc_string:
Remove all non-stun debuffs from the target and provide them with a Barrier and Move Speed.
Can be self-cast. Cooldown is reduced by half when cast on someone else.
Your bullets have a chance to shock your target. The shock will jump to a nearby enemy.
